original_text:
“Are you the first man ever born?
    Were you brought forth before the hills?
korean_text: 네가 제일 먼저 난 사람이냐 산들이 있기 전에 네가 출생하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Are you the first man ever born?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 태어난 사람 중 첫 사람이냐?

sentences.original_text: Were you brought forth before the hills?
